### pecert_regen::switch_master

The pecert_regen::switch_master class.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `pecert_regen::switch_master` plan.

##### `nodes`

Data type: `TargetSpec`

##### `master`

Data type: `String`

Data type: `Boolean`

Default value: `false`
